name: Galaxy Rush
description:
You are a spaceship that meets a hostile ship, you must fight for your life or it will destroys you!

You and your friend will compete on the same keyboard, in a Epic Battle for decide who LIVE and who..DIE!

- Have fun with your friends
- With "one-keyboard gameplay"
- Many updates will come soon ...

- Check out my devBlog for more info on future update

Have Fun!
